item.title: Forwards list of deficiencies in nonpower reactor submissions of decommissioning funding plans.

item.title: Advises that,except for licensees described in encl, decommissioning financial plan submissions from non-power reactor licensees appear to be in full compliance w/ 10CFR50.33(k) & 50.75.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)
